name: Elementos
description:
In Elementos you run, dash and shoot your way through hordes of elemental adversaries all intent on stopping you. 

Will you overcome the elements? 

Controls

Movement - WASD

Aim - Mouse

Fire - Left click

Dodge - Space

Fire Weapon - 1

Water Weapon - 2

Earth Weapon - 3

Air Weapon - 4

Credits:

This a 20 person student project, made over 6 weeks at Staffordshire University. 

The playtest is the result of week 3. Come back in 3 more to see more!
